comment.text: This translation key "User" is used to display the content "User" in various UI contexts, such as a warning message and a label in a table. It appears in a dialog box when deleting a profile and in a data import component for selecting users. Translators should provide a translated version of this text that accurately reflects its purpose in these contexts.

usage.context:
<Trans
 i18nKey="DeleteUserMessage"
 ns="DeleteProfileEverDialog"
 t={t as TFunction}
 values={{
 userCaption: onlyGuests ? t("Common:Guest") : t("Common:User"),
 user: users[0].displayName,
 }}
 components={{
 1: <strong />,
 }}

const { t } = props;
 
 const defaultColumns = [
 {
 key: "User",
 title: t("Common:User"),
 resizable: true,
 enable: true,
 sortBy: "AZ",
 active: true,
 minWidth: 210,

const { t } = props;
 
 const defaultColumns = [
 {
 key: "User",
 title: t("Common:User"),
 resizable: true,
 enable: true,
 default: true,
 sortBy: "AZ",
 active: true,

},
 {
 id: "accounts-add_collaborator",
 className: "main-button_drop-down",
 icon: PersonDefaultReactSvgUrl,
 label: t("Common:User"),
 onClick: () => this.inviteUser(EmployeeType.User),
 "data-type": EmployeeType.User,
 action: EmployeeType.User,
 key: "collaborator",
 },

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයා' (parishiilakayaa) can be a valid translation for 'user', it's quite formal and less commonly used in contemporary Sri Lankan Sinhala. A more common and natural translation would be 'භාවිතකරු' (bhavitakaru).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'භාවිතකරු' (bhavitakaru) for a more natural and common translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '普通用户' (Pǔtōng Yònghù) literally translates to 'Common User', which is not the most accurate or natural rendering of 'User' in many contexts. It implies a distinction from a 'special' or 'premium' user, which may not be intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like '用户' (Yònghù), which is the standard and most versatile translation for 'User'.
